title: 733: THIS BITCOIN CHART IS LIKE A ‘CHEAT CODE’ FOR CALLING BTC’S TOP TRAJECTORY!! $1M PRICE PREDICTION!!
description:
American journalist, Tim Pool speaks out about Bitcoin after hitting recent ATH's.

"People still sh*t on Bitcoin and I feel bad for them. A local guy out here told me he just became a millionaire off his investment, bought in several years ago and forgot about it. It's the rise of a new financial technology and I believe 1 BTC will eventually be equivalent to $1M."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
